package.name: Andreani
package.summary: This extension allows you to connect your Magento store to the most important logistics service in Argentina.
package.description:
Features For merchants: Set user and password for eAndreani Set specific contract cost for every shipping service (standard, to branch, fast shipping). Enable/Disable each shipping service. Custom title and description for each shipping service Configure weight/volume for products attribute (g/cm3 or kg/m3). Full documentation with step by step installation. Google Maps integrated for geolocate cusomers. Include price's variables according price, weight, volume, and distance of shipping.
For Customers: Calculator of shipping cost. Geolocation from shipping address details. Location and distance y distance to the nearest branch for "Shipments to branch". Express delivery service. Tracking of shipments.
